com.ftdichip.ftd2xx
Class DeviceDescriptorRev4

java.lang.Object
  com.ftdichip.ftd2xx.DeviceDescriptor
      com.ftdichip.ftd2xx.DeviceDescriptorRev4

public class DeviceDescriptorRev4
extends DeviceDescriptor

Extends the standard DeviceDescriptor with new fields available for revision 4 devices.

For a more detailed description of the fields see the ftd2xx-API specification.

Author:
Mike Werner
